long_description: Ultralight, responsive and most importantly, fun, the Ride Highlife UL snowboard is an all-mountain slayer that will have you making effortless powder turns, lap after lap. Hybrid All Mountain shape features a rocker in the nose and micro-camber zone that extends under your feet and through the tail for extra pop. Directional twin shape provides plenty of overall float and control, offering a balanced ride that's equally versatile ridden regular or switch. UL wood core features Pop Rods(R) carbon rods in the tip and tail, creating potent pop without adding stiffness; it's ideal for all freestyle maneuvers. Carbon fibers stitched into the fiberglass also lend extra pop without adding extra stiffness. Silencer 5(TM) technology quiets noisy vibrations for a super-smooth ride; Carbon Array 5(TM) stringers in the binding zone channel your power to the board for control. Urethane-infused Membrain(TM) topsheet offers high-quality textures and aesthetics at less than half the weight of traditional plastic topsheets. Skate-inspired Popwalls(R) sidewalls offer amazing stability and enhanced response whether riding groomers, pow or the park. Ride Highlife UL snowboard features a UL (ultralight) core built for high strength without bulk, and a UL sintered base for extremely lightweight performance and precision. .
short_description: Ultralight, responsive and most importantly, fun, the Ride Highlife UL snowboard is an all-mountain slayer that will have you making effortless powder turns, lap after lap.
